|  [Sandbox](./sdk.sandbox.md) | <p>E2B cloud sandbox gives your agent a full cloud development environment that's sandboxed.</p><p>That means: - Access to Linux OS - Using filesystem (create, list, and delete files and dirs) - Run processes - Sandboxed - you can run any code - Access to the internet</p><p>Check usage docs - https://e2b.dev/docs/sandbox/overview</p><p>These cloud sandboxes are meant to be used for agents. Like a sandboxed playgrounds, where the agent can do whatever it wants.</p><p>Use the  method to create a new sandbox.</p> |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [runCode(runtime, code, opts)](./sdk.runcode.md) | Run code in a sandboxed cloud playground. <code>runCode</code> wraps the <code>Sandbox</code> class and provides a simple interface for running code in a sandboxed environment without any need to manage lifecycle of the sandbox. <code>runCode</code> automatically loads the E2B API key from the <code>E2B_API_KEY</code> environment variable. |
|  [withAccessToken(f)](./sdk.withaccesstoken.md) |  |
